gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 113, Pistons 103
gameRecap.excerpt: Brooklyn ends the game on a 29-4 run to defeat Detroit, 113-103. For Brookyln, Cam Thomas led the way with 32 points, six rebounds, and five assists while aided by Dennis Schroder (22 points, five rebounds, six assists) and Noah Clowney (17 points, six rebounds, four blocks) in the victory. Chimezie Metu finished with 20 points, seven rebounds, three steals with Jaden Ivey recording 16 points and 10 assists for Detroit in the losing effort. Brooklyn improves to 31-47, while Detroit moves to 13-65 with the loss.
